event_text: m_c was out on a walk when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} found an injured cat lying alongside a dead eagle. It doesn't take {PRONOUN/m_c/object} long to figure out what happened - n_c:0 was lucky to have survived an attack from such a large bird. Quickly, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} rushes {PRONOUN/n_c:0/object} to the medicine cat, keeping a particularly close eye out for any circling birds above.

history:.scar: m_c was scarred after {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/were/was} dropped by an eagle.
history:.reg_death: m_c died after {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/were/was} dropped by an eagle.
history:.lead_death: died after {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/were/was} dropped by an eagle

event_text: m_c is strolling along the cliffside when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/spot/spots} a body laying at the bottom. Deciding to investigate, m_c realises the cat is a loner, and is about to return to camp when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/hear/hears} the sound of mewling kits, discovering a litter of them tucked underneath a rocky ledge. Not wanting to leave them there to starve, m_c takes the piteous group back to camp, where they're offered a place in the Clan.
